item.title: Fourth batch of students selected
item.description: The fourth batch of students for the Each One Teach One program have been selected!

item.title: Village ponds renovated
item.description: The foundation took responsibility of the village ponds and has resurrected them, much to the villagers’ joy.

item.title: Third batch of students selected
item.description: The third batch of students for the Each One Teach One program have been selected!

item.title: Get in touch
item.description: We would love to hear from you. Please drop us an e-mail or give us a call. Address: “Shree Ganesh”, A-024, Cosmopolis, Dumduma, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India - 751019 Mail: savitreefoundation@gmail.com Phone: +919437035906

item.title: Our Mission
item.description: विद्या ददाति विनयम्, विनय ददाति पात्रताम। पात्रत्वाद्धनमाप्रोति धनाद्धर्मं ततः सुखम्।। To transform village Champati, P.O. Padmapur District, Cuttack of Orissa into a model establishment in a manner that all people, physically challenged and able-bodied, are gainfully employed, to bring about substantial improvements in the state of literacy, health and economic sustenance and finally to harness not just natural resources but also human resources through leadership and motivation. To promote continuous self-improvement in the quality of lives of the residents by generating leadership from within and creating opportunities for utilizing their resources.

item.title: Record rice grain yield due to scientific cropping
item.description: Scientific cropping methods and agricultural implements provided by Savitree Foundation to certain farmers in Champati Village have resulted in highest ever per area yield of paddy in the region (decided by the State Department of Agriculture.). The associated scientists have prepared a document for the same.

item.title: Second batch of students selected
item.description: The second batch of students for the Each One Teach One program have been selected!

item.title: Intensive Agricultural Development Programme Meeting
item.description: Experts from different fields of Agriculture of IAS, SOA University and Coordinator CRTD, SOA University met the local farmers and explored the possibility of farm mechanization and suitability for crop diversification in the agricultural land neighboring the Savitree Foundation Training center. A report and a presentation was made for the same.

item.title: Health Camp conducted
item.description: A health camp was conducted at Padmapur high school, Champati Village in collaboration with IMS and SUM hospital on 29 March, 2015.

item.description: The first batch of students for the Each One Teach One program have been selected!
